block.p: Aimee Jeanne Crawford and Robert Michael Peterson were married yesterday by the Rev. Michael Tueth at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in New York.

The bride and the bridegroom, both 29, work on sports news Internet sites in New York. She is a senior producer for the CNN/Sports Illustrated site. He is a coordinating producer for FOXSports .com. She graduated from Oklahoma State University and he from the University of Wisconsin. They received master's degrees in journalism from Northwestern, where they met.
Aimee Jeanne Crawford and Robert Michael Peterson were married yesterday by the Rev. Michael Tueth at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in New York.

The bride and the bridegroom, both 29, work on sports news Internet sites in New York. She is a senior producer for the CNN/Sports Illustrated site. He is a coordinating producer for FOXSports .com. She graduated from Oklahoma State University and he from the University of Wisconsin. They received master's degrees in journalism from Northwestern, where they met.
Ms. Crawford, who is keeping name, also received a certificate in French language and literature from the Sorbonne. She is a daughter of Kathleen Crawford and Thomas Crawford, both of Tulsa, Okla.
The bridegroom is a son of Sharyl-Lynn Tarantino and Robert G. Peterson, both of Milwaukee.
